title: why was i banned?
body: i was banned for some unknown reason and without warning, i have not received any email at all. please someone explain

replies.body:
it looks like it is happening a lot in NA too.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/pEPAhGd5-14-day-ban-after-over-a-year-of-non-punishment

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EAeU8IAB-14-day-ban-for-toxicity-but-no-pre-warning-from-riot
Did player behaviour give you an explanation?
Any update on this?  Bans are a big issue right now.

It means the ban was done manually by a rioter, for some reason, they don't send emails in that case (Reasonsâ„¢)

Go to Rito support and submit a ticket to find out.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
